00099 #include <sys/types.h>
00100 #include <net/if_arp.h>
00101 #include <netinet/ip.h>
00102 
00110 #ifdef __cplusplus
00111 extern "C" {
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 /*
00115  * Definition of type and code field values.
00116  */
00117 #define ICMP_ECHOREPLY                  0   
00118 #define ICMP_UNREACH                    3   
00119 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_NET            0   
00120 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_HOST           1   
00121 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_PROTOCOL       2   
00122 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_PORT           3   
00123 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_NEEDFRAG       4   
00124 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_SRCFAIL        5   
00125 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_NET_UNKNOWN    6   
00126 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_HOST_UNKNOWN   7   
00127 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_ISOLATED       8   
00128 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_NET_PROHIB     9   
00129 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_HOST_PROHIB    10  
00130 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_TOSNET         11  
00131 #define     ICMP_UNREACH_TOSHOST        12  
00132 #define ICMP_SOURCEQUENCH               4   
00133 #define ICMP_REDIRECT                   5   
00134 #define     ICMP_REDIRECT_NET           0   
00135 #define     ICMP_REDIRECT_HOST          1   
00136 #define     ICMP_REDIRECT_TOSNET        2   
00137 #define     ICMP_REDIRECT_TOSHOST       3   
00138 #define ICMP_ECHO                       8   
00139 #define ICMP_ROUTERADVERT               9   
00140 #define ICMP_ROUTERSOLICIT              10  
00141 #define ICMP_TIMXCEED                   11  
00142 #define     ICMP_TIMXCEED_INTRANS       0   
00143 #define     ICMP_TIMXCEED_REASS         1   
00144 #define ICMP_PARAMPROB                  12  
00145 #define     ICMP_PARAMPROB_OPTABSENT    1   
00146 #define ICMP_TSTAMP                     13  
00147 #define ICMP_TSTAMPREPLY                14  
00148 #define ICMP_IREQ                       15  
00149 #define ICMP_IREQREPLY                  16  
00150 #define ICMP_MASKREQ                    17  
00151 #define ICMP_MASKREPLY                  18  
00153 #define ICMP_MAXTYPE                    18  
00156 #define ICMP_MINLEN 8   
00166 typedef struct __attribute__ ((packed)) icmp {
00167     uint8_t  icmp_type;      
00168     uint8_t  icmp_code;      
00169     uint16_t icmp_cksum;     
00170     uint32_t  icmp_spec;      
00171 } ICMPHDR;
00172 
00173 #ifdef __cplusplus
00174 }
00175 #endif
00176 
00177 #endif
